entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
